name: Gamma Zee 2: The Powers of Hell
name_original: Gamma Zee 2: The Powers of Hell
description:
In 1993, Gamma escaped the depths of hell through a gauntlet of puzzling mazes in the classic title MacKing called "the best game of the year" and Apple4U described as "the pinnacle of video games as an expressive form."

Now, 28 years later, Satan has his grip on the suffering protagonist once more, and you'll need to guide him through technically over five levels to make your escape. Put on your thinking caps, set aside a week or two, and because Gamma is once again about to become...Gamma Zee!

(music and concept copyright 1993, Dwight Rodgers, Happy Software Inc. Used without his permission but also hopefully without his ire)
